Detailed Description

template<class PP, typename vertex_t, typename edge_t>
class canonical_code< SEQ_PROP, vertex_t, edge_t >

Sequence canonical Code class by partial specialization of generic canonical_code class.

pattern_prop is set to directed, acyclic, indegree_lte_one, outdegree_lte_one(sequence property)
